title: A Carver and a Calvinist: On the 2nd Peterson Wave with With Jonathan Pageau and Paul Vander Klay
description:
These two lovely gentlemen, @Jonathan Pageau  and @Paul VanderKlay, allow me to pick there brain on thoughts about @Jordan B Peterson's  recent interview with Jonathan. Had an absolutely fantastic time chatting with them, hope you all enjoy this discussion

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/A-Carver-and-a-Calvinist-On-the-2nd-Peterson-with-With-Jonathan-Pageau-and-Paul-Vander-Klay-evapdd

The original interview between Jonathan and Jordan
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2rAqVmZwqZM

Paul's channel (and this interview: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hhzaraeRBL4

Jonathan's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtCTSf3UwRU14nYWr_xm-dQ
